    • Constructor Detail

      • Company

        public Company(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String nit,
               java.lang.String address,
               java.lang.String phone,
               java.lang.String assets,
               Date dateOfConstitution,
               java.lang.String amountOfEmployees,
               java.lang.String legalRepresentative,
               int floors)
        Description: The constructor of the class Company.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Post: All attributes of the class are initialized.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the company.
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        address - The company's correspondence address.
        phone - The contact phone number of the company.
        assets - the value of the company's assets in pesos.
        dateOfConstitution - The date of constitution of the company.
        amountOfEmployees - The number of the company's employees.
        legalRepresentative - The name of the company's representative legal.
        floors - The number of floors of the company's building.

    • Method Detail

      • getNit

        public java.lang.String getNit()
        Description: This method returns the company's nit.
        Returns:
        A number that represents the nit of the company.

      • addEmployee

        public java.lang.String addEmployee(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String job,
                                    java.lang.String email)
        Description: This method allows adding the employee to the first available cubicle that is found.
        Post: The employee is added and returns a message indicating it or the employee cannot be added and returns a message indicating it.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the employee.
        job - The job of the employee.
        email - The email of the employee.
        Returns:
        A message that indicates if the employee was added or not.
